main.name: Nishant Patel
main.description: I am a full stack developer, have been working in software industry since past 6 years have transitioned between various technologies.
main.bio: Java to Python to Data Science aspect to Front end React Native and now in Vue JS. I love to try new things, amalgamate 2 different tech stack like Python(Django) with Integrated support for React Native. React JS with Fabric JS. Also competitive coding especially i am fond of Code Golfing
main.contactmessage: If you wanna talk to me, feel free to drop me a email or reach out to me on linkedin

resume.skillmessage: Python Developer and JavaScript Developer with total 4+ years of experience in Python and 2+ years of experience in JavaScript. Overall, 6 years of experience in Software Development, Database Development and End to end application deployment.

education.degree: Bachelor in Technology - Electronics and communications engineering
PGD in machine learning with specialization in NLP
education.description: Learnt in-demand skills such as Deep Learning, NLP, Reinforcement Learning

work.title: Senior Full-stack Developer
work.description: Working as a full-stack developer on the Aviso app, which provides sales prediction and insights to its clients. My responsibilities are to develop APIs in Python and consume them on front-end VueJS.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
